welcome.description: A developer having experience of building full web and mobile applications.

aboutSection.title: WHO I AM?
aboutSection.description: My name is HENRIQUE SIQUEIRA. I am a professional and dedicated programmer in my daily life. I am a quick learner with a self-learning attitude. I love to learn and explore new technologies and i always try my best to be perfectionist on my codes and also in the problems resolution. My core skills are based on JavaScript, dominating both Frontend and Backend. I am available for any kind of job opportunity that suits my skills and interests.

experienceData.title: CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript
Self-Employed
experienceData.company: Freelance coding and constant personal projects

projectsData.title: Freelance Project: Language Course
projectsData.description: Language course, responsive. Frontend developed with TypeScript/React/TailwindCSS and reliable to the Figma project.

projectsData.title: Freelance Project: Fashion Store
projectsData.description: Fashion store, responsive and with shopping cart. Fullstack React with login/register system.

projectsData.title: Personal Project: Portfolio
projectsData.description: My portfolio, responsive. Frontend developed with HTML/Typescript/React/TailwindCSS among other tools.

projectsData.title: Burger Restaurant: Digital Menu
projectsData.description: Responsive digital burger menu with shopping cart. Frontend created based on HTML/Javascript/SCSS.

projectsData.title: HUB: Dashboard with login system via API
projectsData.description: Login and dashboard system. Backend in Express for API and HTML/Javascript/SCSS for the frontend.

projectsData.title: API/Prisma: Car Catalog with PRISMA
projectsData.description: Car catalog API for a CarShop. Built on backend with EXPRESS and PRISMA.

testimonyData.description: “Henrique is a fullstack professional who is very committed to his projects. I have had the opportunity to view his codes and they are all in accordance with the best practices.”
testimonyData.author: Wellington Oliveira

testimonyData.description: “Excellent developer! Communicative, capable and knew how to work very well in a team. I have known him for years and have always followed his development.”
testimonyData.author: Miguel Martins

testimonyData.description: “He did a very competent and effective job. He is a guy who really knows what he is doing and who always goes after what is necessary to fulfill what was requested.”
testimonyData.author: Sheilla Andrade
